Plot: Desperate to provide care for her daughter, down-on-her-luck Jean moves in with her father in-law from whom she is estranged. Through time, they learn to forgive each other and heal old wounds.
Title: An Unfinished Life
Actors: Robert Redford, Jennifer Lopez, Morgan Freeman, Josh Lucas
tomatoConsensus: A story of disjointed family members yearning for true emotional depth, An Unfinished Life teeters between overtly saccharine sentiments and moments of real intimacy.
